title: An introduction
content:
Hi everyone,

While I’ve been a member here for some time, and had an interest in type design for probably just as long I haven’t really posted here a lot. I will be seeking critique on my fonts upon me reaching something of substance that I need help with, but that’s along way off. I hope to get to know many of you over the next few months.

If you want to check some of my work out,  
My formal portfolio is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104717/http:/davethedesigner.net/)

and

My Path to Type Blog logging my progress is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104717/http:/pathtotype.blogspot.com/)

The more people looking at my blog, the more pressure on me and the less chance I slack off!

ta!

comments.content: It’s suddenly occurred to me that if I stopped using white all the time my work would look so much better photographed against a white background.

Welcome to Typophile and I enjoyed your work very much.

Sharon
